DOC.detailed_description: 1 . Objective : - To popularize knowledge prevention health care osteoporosis . - To investigate prevalence primary osteoporosis community resident . 2 . Method : - The survey study include five borough six community Shanghai ( Xuhui District 2 , Pudong New Area 1 , Minhang District 1 , Pudong New Area 1 , Jiading District 1 ) . 10,000 participant expect include . - Through questionnaire physical examination form , carry investigation 50-85 year old postmenopausal woman 3-year follow-up period . - Make survey Bone Mineral Density , SF-36 , international osteoporosis foundation ONE-MINUTE OSTEOPOROSIS RISK TEST , Markers bone metabolism test , EQ-5D , Hepatic-renal function test thyroid stimulate hormone level test . - Physicians community backbone , Shanghai University Traditional Chinese Medicine , Longhua Hospital responsible personnel training . - Shanghai Clinical Research Center responsible program data management . - Shanghai District Health Family Planning Commission responsible coordinate organization .
DOC.criteria: Had clinical diagnosis osteoporosis . With Bone Mineral Density dual energy Xray examination , T value < 2.5 less . Be willing able join study sign Informed consent .
